rRofex 0.0.1.0002

Primary API Historical Market Data

Source: R/functions.R
trading_mdh.Rd

trading_mdh retrivies Historical Trades for a given instrument.

trading_mdh(connection, market_id = "ROFX", symbol, date, date_from, date_to)

Arguments

connection

S4. Mandaroty Formal rRofexConnection class object
market_id

String. Market to wich we are going to connect.

  • ROFX. Rofex: Rosario Futures Exchange.

  • MATBA. Matba: Mercado a Termino de Buenos Aires.
symbol

String. Use trading_instruments to see which symbols are available.
date

String. Date to be queried. With format '%Y-%m-%d'.
date_from

String. Used together with 'date_to'.
date_to

String. Userd together with 'date_from'.

Value

If correct, it will load a data frame.

See also

Other market data functions: trading_md()
